headline: A Look At Constellation Brands (STZ) Valuation After Its Earnings Beat And Guidance Reaffirmation
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) is back in focus after reporting a quarter that topped revenue and profit expectations, reiterating guidance and highlighting continued pricing power across its premium beer portfolio, led by Modelo and Corona. See our latest analysis for Constellation Brands. headline: How Investors May Respond To Constellation Brands (STZ) Earnings Beat Amid Buybacks And Dividend Steadiness
summary: In early January 2026, Constellation Brands reported third-quarter 2025 results showing lower sales and net income year over year, while also completing a roughly US$824.13 million share repurchase program and affirming a quarterly dividend of US$1.02 per share. Despite the softer quarter, management highlighted resilience in its high-end beer portfolio and disciplined pricing and cost actions that helped underpin earnings and support ongoing capital returns.
